summary: This mod adds rings that add the ability to create runes on bashing with any weapon (including bows)
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]This mod adds 4 rings which can be found in the riverwood trader on the counter. [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]THIS MOD REQUIRES DAWNGUARD!!! [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]The rings add the ability to create runes on bashing with any weapon (including bows) [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]The four rings are as follows: [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]ring 1: runic ability (same as rune hammer in dawnguard) [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]Ring 2: Runic ability but this ring uses slot 59 [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]Ring 3: Runic Ability, Improved Skein of magnus, WaterBreathing, And shout timer reduction. [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]Ring 4: same as ring 3 but using slot 59. [/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]
[/color][/font][font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif][color=#acb2b8]known glitches: transforming into vampire lord will cause the rings ability to place runes to stop working. to fix simply unequip and re-equip the ring.[/color][/font]
author: JR5 Sirray23
